rooms.description: A welcoming entrance hall with a reception desk, decorative elements, and Vastu-compliant positioning.
Spacious living room with colonial-style furnishings, large windows for ample light, and open to the adjoining patio.
A formal dining area adjacent to the living room, designed with colonial accents and proper Vastu alignment.
Fully equipped kitchen featuring classic colonial elements, efficient layout, and adherence to safety norms and local building codes.
A guest bathroom with a modern Colonial style design ensuring privacy and comfort while considering Vastu directions for water usage.

openings.description: The main entrance designed to face the east or northeast as per Vastu guidelines with decorative colonial detailing.
A door connecting the living area to a semi-outdoor patio area that leads to a larger rooftop terrace.

rooms.description: Largest bedroom featuring colonial style furniture, large windows for natural light, and a private balcony oriented as per Vastu.
Cozy bedroom designed with colonial details, ensuring ample space for personalization and proper alignment.
A functional bedroom featuring standard colonial decor while being mindful of Vastu principles regarding the placement of beds and furniture.
Multi-purpose bathroom with colonial fixtures, designed for family use and located according to Vastu guidelines on water placements.

openings.description: A well-designed colonial staircase connecting the two floors with sufficient space for safe passage and adherence to building codes.
An elevator facilitating easy movement of items between levels, designed keeping in mind local safety regulations.

terrace_details.description: A colonial-style rooftop terrace offering a relaxing outdoor space with views, seating areas, and appropriate safety railings.

notes: This design adheres to the Colonial style in both residential aesthetics and functionality, incorporating Vastu principles such as optimal room orientations and natural light. The plan follows local building norms for a G+1 4BHK bungalow with a total area of 2500 sqft.
